about_the_game: The last RWD car to win the World Rally Championship in 1983, the 037 was a legend of Group B rallying. The mid engined RWD monster made use of its supercharged powerplant, producing around 325hp. The Lancia 037 was succeeded by the AWD Lancia Delta S4.
detailed_description: The last RWD car to win the World Rally Championship in 1983, the 037 was a legend of Group B rallying. The mid engined RWD monster made use of its supercharged powerplant, producing around 325hp. The Lancia 037 was succeeded by the AWD Lancia Delta S4.
